actions.description: The champion makes three Greatsword or Shortbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the champion has more than half of its total hit points remaining.
actions.name: Shortbow

specialTraits.description: The champion rerolls a failed saving throw.
specialTraits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
